Docs.summary: Marks a method or type to indicate that it has no side effects.

remarks.para: Only methods marked Pure may be used within code contract definitions. This is to ensure that checking a contract causes no side-effects.
Methods within the System.Diagnostics.Contracts namespace are always considered to be pure. Some delegates are always considered to be pure, such as and .
